an6.70:4.1: “‘So vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na santena samādhinā na paṇītena na paṭippassaddhiladdhena na ekodibhāvādhigatena anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhavissati—
an6.70:4.2: ekopi hutvā bahudhā bhavissati, bahudhāpi hutvā eko bhavissati … pe …
an6.70:4.3: yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattessatī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an6.70:4.4: ‘Dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇissati—
an6.70:4.5: dibbe ca mānuse ca ye dūre santike cā’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an6.70:4.7: sarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittanti pajānissati … pe …
an6.70:4.8: vimuttaṃ vā cittaṃ vimuttaṃ cittanti pajānissatī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an6.70:4.11: iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarissatī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an6.70:4.12: ‘Dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passissati … pe …
an6.70:4.13: yathākammūpage satte pajānissatī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an6.70:4.15: sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissatī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an6.70:5.1: ‘So vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santena samādhinā paṇītena paṭippassaddhiladdhena ekodibhāvādhigatena anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhavissati … pe …
an6.70:5.2: yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattessatī’ti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati.
an6.70:5.3: ‘Dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇissati—
an6.70:5.4: dibbe ca mānuse ca ye dūre santike cā’ti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati.
an6.70:5.6: sarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittanti pajānissati … pe …
an6.70:5.7: vimuttaṃ vā cittaṃ vimuttaṃ cittanti pajānissatī’ti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati.
an6.70:5.10: iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarissatī’ti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati.
an6.70:5.11: ‘Dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passissati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe, sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānissatī’ti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati.
